SEARCH
Package com.app.persistence.repository

Interface ClientRepository

All Superinterfaces:
CrudRepository<ClientEntity>, org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<ClientEntity,Long>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<ClientEntity,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListCrudRepository<ClientEntity,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListPagingAndSortingRepository<ClientEntity,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<ClientEntity,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<ClientEntity>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<ClientEntity,Long>
@Repository public interface ClientRepository extends CrudRepository<ClientEntity>
Repository interface for accessing ClientEntity entities in the database.

This interface provides methods for performing CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) operations on ClientEntity objects. Additionally, it provides custom query methods to retrieve clients based on specific criteria, such as searching by name and surname.

The repository extends CrudRepository, which provides basic CRUD operations. Custom queries or other advanced querying mechanisms can also be added to this interface.

See Also:

  • Method Details

    • findByNameAndSurname

      Optional<ClientEntity> findByNameAndSurname(String name, String surname)
      Retrieves a ClientEntity by the client's name and surname.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the client
      surname - the surname of the client
      Returns:
      an Optional containing the ClientEntity if found, or empty if no client exists with the given name and surname
